Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Interface AbilitySlice.FormCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    AbilitySlice

    public static interface AbilitySlice.FormCallback
    Provides callbacks that will be invoked when a Form instance is obtained or when the Form provider is uninstalled.

    This interface must be implemented to listen for the Form acquisition result and uninstallation event of the form provider if your application needs to call AbilitySlice#acquireForm(Intent, FormCallback) to obtain a Form instance.

    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int OHOS_FORM_ACQUIRE_SUCCESS
      Indicates that the Form is obtained successfully.
      static int OHOS_FORM_APPLY_FAILURE
      Indicates that the system failed to draw the form layout.
      static int OHOS_FORM_PREVIEW_FAILURE
      Indicates that the system failed to generate the form preview.
      static int OHOS_FORM_REAPPLY_FAILURE
      Indicates that the system failed to update the form layout.
      static int OHOS_FORM_RESTORE_FAILURE
      Indicates that the system failed to restore the form.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onAcquired​(int result, Form form)
      Called to notify the application that the Form instance has been obtained after the application called the asynchronous method AbilitySlice#acquireForm(Intent, FormCallback).
      void onFormUninstalled​(int formId)
      Deprecated. 
      Use onFormUninstalled(long) instead.
      default void onFormUninstalled​(long formId)
      Called to notify the application that the Form provider has been uninstalled and the corresponding Form instance is no longer available.

    • Method Detail

      • onAcquired

        void onAcquired​(int result,
                Form form)
        Called to notify the application that the Form instance has been obtained after the application called the asynchronous method AbilitySlice#acquireForm(Intent, FormCallback). The application must present the form information on a specific page in this callback.
        Parameters:
        result - Specifies whether the asynchronous form acquisition process is successful. FormCallback#OHOS_FORM_ACQUIRE_SUCCESS indicates that the form is successfully obtained, and other values indicate that the process fails.
        form - Indicates the obtained Form instance.
        Since:
        5

      • onFormUninstalled

        @Deprecated
void onFormUninstalled​(int formId)
        Deprecated. Use onFormUninstalled(long) instead.
        Called to notify the application that the Form provider has been uninstalled and the corresponding Form instance is no longer available. Compatible with int form id.
        Parameters:
        formId - Indicates the ID of the Form instance provided by the uninstalled form provider.
        Since:
        5

      • onFormUninstalled

        default void onFormUninstalled​(long formId)
        Called to notify the application that the Form provider has been uninstalled and the corresponding Form instance is no longer available.
        Parameters:
        formId - Indicates the ID of the Form instance provided by the uninstalled form provider.
        Since:
        5
